article.title: Precise measurement of hyperfine structure in the $ \rm {3 S_{1/2}} $ state of $ \rm {^7Li} $

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the primary motivation behind the authors\' decision to measure the hyperfine interval in the 3S<sub>1/2</sub>  state of <sup>7</sup>Li?
choices: To verify the accuracy of previously established theoretical calculations.
To develop a novel experimental technique for hyperfine structure measurements.
To resolve discrepancies between conflicting values reported in previous studies.
To investigate the effects of external magnetic fields on hyperfine splitting.
